    • Constructor Detail

      • MockChannel

        public MockChannel(java.net.Socket socket,
                   java.net.InetSocketAddress localAddress,
                   java.lang.String profile,
                   java.util.function.Consumer<MockTcpTransport.MockChannel> onClose)
        Constructs a new MockChannel instance intended for handling the actual incoming / outgoing traffic.
        Parameters:
        socket - The client socket. Mut not be null.
        localAddress - Address associated with the corresponding local server socket. Must not be null.
        profile - The associated profile name.
        onClose - Callback to execute when this channel is closed.

        profile - The associated profile name.
